text: Jaba palanaharale aneka kuraharubata ibrahimako pariksa liyo ra uni ti sabaima uttirna bha'e. Ta allahale bhan'yo ki ma timila'i sansarabharika manisaharuko pathapradarsaka bana'unechu. Unale bhane ki (palanakarta) mera santatila'i pani, allahale bhannu bhayo, hamro vaca an'yayiharuko lagi hunechaina
